WorkItem.ClosedComment: Not an issue with PHPExcel code
WorkItem.Summary: Impossible to read a xls file

Comments.Message:
Can you perhaps give us a little more information, like how you know that the file isn't being read.... what are you doing with $objPHPExcel after loading it?
You're not getting any error messages, assumption that you have enabled error logging. Put a try/catch block around the code around the load(), PHJPExcel throws exceptions.

In fact, when I say "read" I mean that I can't see my file's content in the page...
The code I wrote is the only code I use...

How can I display my file's content on the page ?

Start by taking a look at the documentation, particularly section 4.5 of the PHPExcel developer documentation.doc; and examples in /Tests particularly 13calculation.php, 18extendedcalculation.php and 28iterator.php.
Also, in future, can you please post such requests for help in the "Discussion" section of the site. The "Issue Tracker" is for reporting bugs and errors within the PHPExcel code and/or documentation
